translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

On this date an official communication is made to the Chief of Police of Alegrete, to disarm the emigrants of the United Army, with the exception of the officers, and to make all of them march to São Gabriel, to which point the Most Excellent Bento Manuel is said to have sent Your Excellency, in order to put himself at the head of those emigrants; consequently, the government orders Your Excellency to keep them there under your watch, instructing you to supply them only with rations of meat.

If to carry out the disarmament of the said emigrants it becomes necessary for that chief of police to have the assistance of the armed forces, Your Excellency Your Excellency

May God keep Your Excellency

Secretary of War Affairs Caçapava, January 19, 1840

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira.

Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre
